Field Label: This instrument was downloaded from the CAMH Common Data Elements Library. All fields have been institutionally standardized and should not be modified. Please direct any questions or concerns to clinical.redcap@camh.ca This field is @HIDDEN

Section Header: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems?
Field Label: 1.  Feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 0, Not at all | 1, Several days | 2, Over half the days | 3, Nearly every day

Field Label: 2.  Not being able to stop or control worrying
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 0, Not at all | 1, Several days | 2, Over half the days | 3, Nearly every day

Field Label: 3.  Worrying too much about different things
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 0, Not at all | 1, Several days | 2, Over half the days | 3, Nearly every day
0, Not at all | 1, Several days | 2, Over half the days | 3, Nearly every day

Field Label: 5.  Being so restless that it's hard to sit still
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 0, Not at all | 1, Several days | 2, Over half the days | 3, Nearly every day
0, Not at all | 1, Several days | 2, Over half the days | 3, Nearly every day

Field Label: 7.  Feeling afraid as if something awful might happen
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 0, Not at all | 1, Several days | 2, Over half the days | 3, Nearly every day

Field Label: If you checked off any problems, how difficult have these made it for you to do your work, take care of things at home, or get along with other people?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 0, Not difficult at all | 1, Somewhat difficult | 2, Very difficult | 3, Extremely difficult
